item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: What to know about Tyler Robinson, Charlie Kirk shooting suspect: How he was caught
item.description: Authorities have taken into custody the person they suspect of shooting and killing conservative activist Charlie Kirk on Wednesday at a Utah universi...

item.title: Suspect arrested, identified in shooting of Charlie Kirk, officials say
item.description: Tyler Robinson was identified as the alleged shooter of Charlie Kirk.

item.title: WATCH: Person in custody in shooting of Charlie Kirk, Trump says
item.description: A person is in custody in the fatal shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, President Trump said.

item.title: Prince Harry makes surprise visit to Ukraine in support of wounded service members
item.description: Prince Harry has arrived in Ukraine for a surprise visit to support wounded service members
